data.title: 准备以至少 30 秒的时间回答以下问题
data.subject: Talk about someone you know who is reliable.
data.answer: A reliable person is someone who can be trusted to behave well, work hard, or do what other people expect them to do. Let's talk about a reliable person I know.  This reliable person is my friend, Chloe, and she is very trustworthy. I have been stalked by two men once at Castle Towers when I was 16, and I couldn't get rid of them and I was freaking out. So, instead of calling the police, I called Chloe because I know she was nearby. She then sent her mom to pick me up and finally I got rid of the two creepy men. It is really important to be a reliable person and to have some reliable friends because once you encounter some emergencies or urgent accidents, you will always find someone to help.

options.content: What are some examples of how this person is reliable?
Why is it important for someone to be reliable?
